S

sendHDPDataToDevice(int, byte[]) - Method in class bluetooth.hdpManager
Send HDP data frames to Continua Health devices after processing the ones previously received and generate the proper response to them.
setPropertyRemoteDevice(String, String, boolean) - Method in class bluetooth.hdpManager
Modify a property of a remote device.
shortDescriptionValue - Static variable in class bluetooth.hdpManager
 
showDefaultLocalBluetoothAdaptersProperties() - Method in class bluetooth.hdpManager
Show all properties of the DEFAULT local bluetooth adapter.
showHDPDataChannelProperties(String) - Method in class bluetooth.hdpManager
Show the properties of a HDP data channel previously created.
showHDPDataFrame(int) - Method in class bluetooth.hdpManager
Show HDP data frame received.
showLocalBluetoothAdaptersPath() - Method in class bluetooth.hdpManager
Show path of all local bluetooth adapters available at PC (may be more than one).
showRemoteBluetoothAdapterProperties(String) - Method in class bluetooth.hdpManager
Show all properties of a remote device (it should be first created with getRemoteBluetoothAdapterPath method).
startDbusPlatform() - Method in class bluetooth.hdpManager
Start dbus platform for message interchanging within processes in Linux OS.
